name: Figments
description:
Project Name;Figments

Team Name; Dark Avalon

Project Description:

Reality isn’t always accurate to everyone, that is the purpose of this game, where the characters imagination gets the better of them.

Controls:

A and D for forward and backward movement.

W and S for camera changes.

Space for jump.

Esc for the pause menu.

Team Members:

Nathan  Bell - Engine

Ryan Bourne - 3D Art Assets

James Findlay - 3D Art Assets

Callum Hay - 3D Art Assets

Name of your submission:
DarkAvalon_Figments

PreJam content:

Modular road asset from the POLYGON - City Pack by synty studios.

Modular base grass asset from the POLYGON - City Pack by synty studios.

The advanced magic FX13 pack.
